events.title: Fête 3: By the Sea
events.description: The UK's premier melee tournament, Fête, returns and is bigger than ever!
events.embedCode:
Don't miss out on the event of the Summer! 🌞 Fête 3 early bird prices are available until the new year! 🎉

Your ticket includes Friday-Monday on site accommodation, and you can pay in instalments at https://t.co/2qbuJrTeZF! 💸https://t.co/wkOx66Sx78 🥳#SeaYouThere 🏖️ pic.twitter.com/v7lYYowBEZ

— Fête (@FeteSmash) October 30, 2022

events.title: Regen 2023
events.description: The premier UK Smash Ultimate tournament is back, this time for 3 DAYS!

events.title: Tera
events.description: Europe's very first Super Major with room for 1000+ attendees feat. various top international players.
events.embedCode:
Time to move up a gear ! 🚀

Are you ready for the next Major ?

Asobi and our partners are proud to present you #Tera 🏯

Rendez-vous on the 1st-3rd of September for the next big stop on the European scene !

Registrations start tomorrow 👇🏻https://t.co/awCeM1hPVo pic.twitter.com/8jwwQOQIvn

— Asobi (@asobi_esport) June 25, 2023

events.title: Tech Republic VII
events.description: Spain's well established Smash Bros. Ultimate Major in Barcelona returns with its 7th edition featuring a capacity of 600+ players.

events.title: Arcamelee #4
events.description: Arcamelee is fruits of a strong partnership between the local Melee community and the Arcaneum gaming bar. Some of the greatest players from around the world like Cody Schwab and moky will be attending this edition. There's a cap op 256 players.

events.title: Vienna Challengers Arena 2023
events.description: Since 2017 Vienna Challengers Arena has been a big part of VIECC© Vienna Comic Con and its Super Smash Bros competitions established itself as one of the biggest tournaments in the German-speaking region! This year's edition has a capacity for 512 Smash Bros. Ultimate participants. Partcipation includes access to the entire Vienna Comic Con.

events.title: Ultimate Fighting Arena 2023
events.description: One of the most prestigious fighting game events in the world makes it return with another 3 day event featuring Smash Bros. Ultimate and various other Fighting games.

events.title: Sunrise 2023
events.description: The Cicadas Gaming in collaboration with the city of Hyères and all the T.Os of the south-east region of France offer you the very first Smash Bros. Ultimate Major of the region!
events.embedCode:
L'heure d'enfin venir dans le sud !

On vous tiens au courant sur @Sunrise_Lan 👀 pic.twitter.com/t2wnvx6mJA

— CICADAS Gaming (@CicadasGaming) July 15, 2023
